title: Documentation
description: pwndbg (/paʊnˈdiˌbʌɡ/) is a GDB plug-in that makes debugging with GDB suck less, with a focus on features needed by low-level software developers, hardware hackers, reverse-engineers and exploit developers.

items.title: Pwndbg coding sprints report
items.content_html: Report of the two coding sprints with Pwndbg
